member.name: T:IBKR.Api.Client.Core.IBKRClientOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for the IBKR API client.

member.name: P:IBKR.Api.Client.Core.IBKRClientOptions.BaseUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the base URL for the IBKR API. Default: https://api.ibkr.com/v1/api For Client Portal Gateway: https://localhost:5000/v1/api

member.name: P:IBKR.Api.Client.Core.IBKRClientOptions.BearerToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the bearer token for authentication.

member.name: P:IBKR.Api.Client.Core.IBKRClientOptions.AccessToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the OAuth 2.0 access token.

member.name: P:IBKR.Api.Client.Core.IBKRClientOptions.RateLimitPerSecond
member.summary: Gets or sets the global rate limit (requests per second). Default: 50 (production API limit) Client Portal Gateway: 10

member.name: P:IBKR.Api.Client.Core.IBKRClientOptions.EnableRetry
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable automatic retry on transient failures. Default: true

member.name: P:IBKR.Api.Client.Core.IBKRClientOptions.MaxRetryAttempts
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of retry attempts. Default: 3

member.name: P:IBKR.Api.Client.Core.IBKRClientOptions.RetryDelayMilliseconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the base delay for exponential backoff (in milliseconds). Default: 1000ms

member.name: P:IBKR.Api.Client.Core.IBKRClientOptions.TimeoutSeconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP request timeout (in seconds). Default: 30 seconds

member.name: P:IBKR.Api.Client.Core.IBKRClientOptions.ThrowOnApiError
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to throw exceptions on API errors. If false, errors are returned in the response object. Default: true

member.name: P:IBKR.Api.Client.Core.IBKRClientOptions.EnableLogging
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to log HTTP requests and responses. Default: false

member.name: P:IBKR.Api.Client.Core.IBKRClientOptions.ValidateSslCertificates
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to validate SSL certificates. Default: true (should only be false for testing with self-signed certs)

member.name: M:IBKR.Api.Client.Core.IBKRClientOptions.Validate
member.summary: Validates the configuration options.

member.name: T:IBKR.Api.Client.Exceptions.AuthenticationException
member.summary: Exception thrown when authentication fails or credentials are invalid.

member.name: M:IBKR.Api.Client.Exceptions.AuthenticationException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:IBKR.Api.Client.Exceptions.AuthenticationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with inner exception.
member.param: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

member.name: M:IBKR.Api.Client.Exceptions.AuthenticationException.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with response content.
member.param: The message that describes the error.
The response content from the API.

member.summary: Base exception for all IBKR API-related errors.

member.summary: Gets the HTTP status code associated with this exception, if applicable.

member.name: P:IBKR.Api.Client.Exceptions.IBKRApiException.ResponseContent
member.summary: Gets the response content from the API, if available.

member.name: M:IBKR.Api.Client.Exceptions.IBKRApiException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:IBKR.Api.Client.Exceptions.IBKRApiException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:IBKR.Api.Client.Exceptions.IBKRApiException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and inner exception.
member.param: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

member.name: M:IBKR.Api.Client.Exceptions.IBKRApiException.#ctor(System.String,System.Net.HttpStatusCode,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with HTTP details.

The HTTP status code.
The response content from the API.

member.name: M:IBKR.Api.Client.Exceptions.IBKRApiException.#ctor(System.String,System.Net.HttpStatusCode,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with HTTP details and inner exception.
member.param: The message that describes the error.
The HTTP status code.
The response content from the API.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

member.name: T:IBKR.Api.Client.Infrastructure.RateLimiter.IRateLimiter
member.summary: Interface for rate limiting HTTP requests.

member.name: M:IBKR.Api.Client.Infrastructure.RateLimiter.IRateLimiter.WaitAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Waits asynchronously until a request can be made without exceeding the rate limit.
member.param: Cancellation token.
member.returns: A task that completes when the request can proceed.

member.name: M:IBKR.Api.Client.Infrastructure.RateLimiter.IRateLimiter.TryAcquire
member.summary: Tries to acquire permission to make a request immediately.
member.returns: True if the request can proceed immediately; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:IBKR.Api.Client.Infrastructure.RateLimiter.TokenBucketRateLimiter
member.summary: Token bucket rate limiter implementation. Allows bursts up to the bucket capacity while maintaining an average rate.

member.name: M:IBKR.Api.Client.Infrastructure.RateLimiter.TokenBucketRateLimiter.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Maximum number of requests per second.

member.name: T:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderStatusEnum
member.summary: Represents the current status of an order.

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderStatusEnum.Submitted
member.summary: Order has been submitted but not yet acknowledged

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderStatusEnum.Filled
member.summary: Order has been filled completely

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderStatusEnum.Cancelled
member.summary: Order has been canceled

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderStatusEnum.PartiallyFilled
member.summary: Order has been partially filled

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderStatusEnum.PendingSubmit
member.summary: Order is pending submission

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderStatusEnum.PendingCancel
member.summary: Order is pending cancellation

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderStatusEnum.PreSubmitted
member.summary: Order has been pre-submitted

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderStatusEnum.Inactive
member.summary: Order is inactive

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderStatusEnum.Unknown
member.summary: Order status is unknown

member.name: T:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderType
member.summary: Represents the type of order to be placed.

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderType.MKT
member.summary: Market order - executes at the current market price

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderType.LMT
member.summary: Limit order - executes at a specified price or better

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderType.STP
member.summary: Stop order - becomes a market order when the stop price is reached

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderType.STP_LMT
member.summary: Stop-limit order - becomes a limit order when the stop price is reached

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderType.REL
member.summary: Relative order - price specified as an offset from the market

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderType.TRAIL
member.summary: Trailing stop order - stop price follows the market by a specified amount

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.OrderType.MIDPRICE
member.summary: Midpoint order - executes at the midpoint between bid and ask

member.summary: Represents the type of financial security/instrument.

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.SecurityType.STK
member.summary: Stock

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.SecurityType.OPT
member.summary: Option

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.SecurityType.FUT
member.summary: Future

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.SecurityType.FOP
member.summary: Future Option

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.SecurityType.IND
member.summary: Index

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.SecurityType.CASH
member.summary: Cash/Forex

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.SecurityType.BOND
member.summary: Bond

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.SecurityType.FUND
member.summary: Mutual Fund

member.name: T:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.TimeInForce
member.summary: Specifies how long an order remains active before it is executed or expires.

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.TimeInForce.DAY
member.summary: Day order - valid for the current trading day only

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.TimeInForce.GTC
member.summary: Good Till Canceled - remains active until filled or manually canceled

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.TimeInForce.IOC
member.summary: Immediate or Cancel - fills immediately (partially or fully) or cancels

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.TimeInForce.FOK
member.summary: Fill or Kill - must be filled entirely immediately or is canceled

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.TimeInForce.OPG
member.summary: At the Opening - executes at the market opening

member.name: F:IBKR.Api.Client.Models.Enums.TimeInForce.DTC
member.summary: Day Till Canceled - valid until the end of the trading day
